hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah said:"A vow does not bring anything to the son of Adam that has not been decreed for him. It is just a means of taking wealth from the miserly

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّذْرِ لاَ يُقَدِّمُ شَيْئًا وَلاَ يُؤَخِّرُهُ
chapter.eng-name: A Vow Does Not Bring Anything Forward Nor Put It Back
